lead_paragraph: The ABC series, which had been filmed in Montreal, will take advantage of a state tax credit and join a growing list of episodic shows being produced in the city.

headline.print_headline: A New Addition to the City’s TV Boom
headline.main: TV as New York Growth Industry: ‘Quantico’ Is Coming to Town

snippet: The ABC series, which had been filmed in Montreal, will take advantage of a state tax credit and join a growing list of episodic shows being produced in the city.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo announces that production for ABC drama Quantico will relocate to New York City from Montreal; Julie Menin, commissioner for Mayor’s Office of Media and Entertainment, says growth of TV and movie production creates thousands of high-paying jobs and boosts small businesses; productions cite New York's 30 percent tax break for decision to move their operations to city.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Mayor's Office of Media and Entertainment
